## About Our Hackathons

Our hackathons are intensive, collaborative events where participants work in teams to develop innovative solutions to real-world challenges. Over the course of 48-72 hours, teams ideate, design, and prototype their solutions, guided by industry mentors and subject matter experts.

Whether you're a developer, designer, data scientist, or domain expert, our hackathons provide an exciting opportunity to apply your skills, learn new technologies, and connect with like-minded innovators.

## Hackathon Format

Our hackathons typically follow this structure to maximize learning, collaboration, and innovation:

```{=html}
<div class="row mt-5">
  <div class="col-md-12">
    <div class="timeline">
      <div class="timeline-item">
        <div class="timeline-marker bg-primary"></div>
        <div class="timeline-content">
          <h3>Kick-off & Team Formation</h3>
          <p>Introduction to the hackathon theme, challenges, and rules. Participants form diverse teams with complementary skills.</p>
        </div>
      </div>
      
      <div class="timeline-item">
        <div class="timeline-marker bg-primary"></div>
        <div class="timeline-content">
          <h3>Ideation & Planning</h3>
          <p>Teams brainstorm solutions, define project scope, and create a development plan with clearly defined tasks and goals.</p>
        </div>
      </div>
      
      <div class="timeline-item">
        <div class="timeline-marker bg-primary"></div>
        <div class="timeline-content">
          <h3>Development & Mentorship</h3>
          <p>Teams work on implementing their solutions with guidance from industry mentors who provide technical advice and feedback.</p>
        </div>
      </div>
      
      <div class="timeline-item">
        <div class="timeline-marker bg-primary"></div>
        <div class="timeline-content">
          <h3>Iteration & Refinement</h3>
          <p>Teams refine their solutions based on mentor feedback, user testing, and technical challenges encountered.</p>
        </div>
      </div>
      
      <div class="timeline-item">
        <div class="timeline-marker bg-primary"></div>
        <div class="timeline-content">
          <h3>Presentations & Judging</h3>
          <p>Teams present their solutions to a panel of judges who evaluate based on innovation, technical implementation, usability, and potential impact.</p>
        </div>
      </div>
      
      <div class="timeline-item">
        <div class="timeline-marker bg-primary"></div>
        <div class="timeline-content">
          <h3>Awards & Next Steps</h3>
          <p>Winners are announced and teams receive guidance on how to further develop their solutions beyond the hackathon.</p>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>
```


## Frequently Asked Questions

```{=html}
<div class="row mt-5">
  <div class="col-md-12">
    <div class="accordion" id="hackathonFAQ">
      <div class="accordion-item">
        <h2 class="accordion-header" id="headingOne">
          <button class="accordion-button" type="button" data-bs-toggle="collapse" data-bs-target="#collapseOne" aria-expanded="true" aria-controls="collapseOne">
            Who can participate in your hackathons?
          </button>
        </h2>
        <div id="collapseOne" class="accordion-collapse collapse show" aria-labelledby="headingOne" data-bs-parent="#hackathonFAQ">
          <div class="accordion-body">
            Our hackathons are open to students, professionals, and enthusiasts with relevant skills and interests. Some hackathons may have specific eligibility requirements, which will be clearly stated on the event page.
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
      
      <div class="accordion-item">
        <h2 class="accordion-header" id="headingTwo">
          <button class="accordion-button collapsed" type="button" data-bs-toggle="collapse" data-bs-target="#collapseTwo" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="collapseTwo">
            Do I need to have a team before registering?
          </button>
        </h2>
        <div id="collapseTwo" class="accordion-collapse collapse" aria-labelledby="headingTwo" data-bs-parent="#hackathonFAQ">
          <div class="accordion-body">
            No, you can register as an individual and form a team during the hackathon. We provide team formation activities at the beginning of each event to help participants find teammates with complementary skills.
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
      
      <div class="accordion-item">
        <h2 class="accordion-header" id="headingThree">
          <button class="accordion-button collapsed" type="button" data-bs-toggle="collapse" data-bs-target="#collapseThree" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="collapseThree">
            What should I bring to a hackathon?
          </button>
        </h2>
        <div id="collapseThree" class="accordion-collapse collapse" aria-labelledby="headingThree" data-bs-parent="#hackathonFAQ">
          <div class="accordion-body">
            Participants should bring their laptops, chargers, and any specific hardware they might need for their projects. For in-person events, consider bringing personal items for comfort during the long hours (e.g., water bottle, snacks, etc.). All major meals are typically provided.
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
      
      <div class="accordion-item">
        <h2 class="accordion-header" id="headingFour">
          <button class="accordion-button collapsed" type="button" data-bs-toggle="collapse" data-bs-target="#collapseFour" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="collapseFour">
            Are there any costs associated with participation?
          </button>
        </h2>
        <div id="collapseFour" class="accordion-collapse collapse" aria-labelledby="headingFour" data-bs-parent="#hackathonFAQ">
          <div class="accordion-body">
            Most of our hackathons are free to participate in, though some specialized events may have a nominal registration fee. Any associated costs will be clearly indicated on the event registration page.
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
      
      <div class="accordion-item">
        <h2 class="accordion-header" id="headingFive">
          <button class="accordion-button collapsed" type="button" data-bs-toggle="collapse" data-bs-target="#collapseFive" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="collapseFive">
            How can organizations sponsor or propose challenges for hackathons?
          </button>
        </h2>
        <div id="collapseFive" class="accordion-collapse collapse" aria-labelledby="headingFive" data-bs-parent="#hackathonFAQ">
          <div class="accordion-body">
            Organizations interested in sponsoring hackathons or proposing specific challenges should contact our partnerships team. We offer various sponsorship packages and can work with you to design challenges that align with your organization's goals and interests.
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>
```
